Tooltip.enUS: The advanced anti armor units of the Empire are capable of killing groups of enemies. Concentrated weapon energy and shock waves can cause damage to enemies in a straight line and stun them

Giga Fortress！Ultimate unit！
With both air and land modes, it deals devastating blows to enemies

Can be air and ground
Recycle and destroy the unit（No refund of expenses）

The Hover mecha was a prototype of the Striker V-X developed in the early days of the Empire. Due to its low cost, it was often used in early wars and was able to better attack heavily armored targets.
Shape-shifting droids of the Empire. Can move at high speed and attack air units when in jet mode, but is not good at hitting heavy armor targets.
Deformable auxiliary high fire support unit. Attack ground units while in helicopter mode.
Unlock the primary nanotechnology power of the empire, unlock more basic troops to support the empire's battles
Unlock advanced units of the empire, allowing for faster and better expansion of the empire
Unlock the advanced nanotechnology armament power of the empire, allowing it to train and build powerful heavy land and air forces to deal with more powerful enemies
Unlock the experimental weapons of the Empire, release these terrifying killing machines onto the battlefield, and clear all obstacles for the Empire

King Oni X is the exclusive prototype of the Emperor of the Empire. It once represented the highest power of the Empire's land, and has the power to crush all ground and air threats. Ultimate unit.
After numerous process simplifications, which greatly reduced training costs while maximizing their effectiveness, they can now be mass-produced on a small scale！

Character: The ultimate anti-tank assault Mech

Behaviors.Icon: 盟军协议：先进电力供应
